short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly add checkboxes to each connection, enabling you to selectively clean individual connections or remove all at once. ðŸ—¹

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Efficient Network Management: Quickly select and remove multiple connections at once, saving time and effort.
Flexible Selection: Add checkboxes to each connection, letting you choose specific contacts or clear your entire list in one go.
Improved Organization: Keep your professional network relevant by easily removing inactive or unnecessary connections.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple, intuitive design makes it easy to manage connections effectively.
Privacy Control: Streamline connections to match your current professional goals, giving you control over your network.

Note: This extension is not authorized by LinkedIn.
